name: italist, Inc
description: Operator of an e-commerce fashion platform intended to offer new fashion updates from luxury brands all over the world. The company's platform offers a wide range of clothing, accessories, shoes, bags, and jewelry from all luxury brands, enabling customers to purchase authentic items at a discounted price with quality services.
